overview.en: ARG is an asset preservation system based on block chain technology and artificial intelligence. Through the combination of real gold backing and mining and intelligent contract technology, ARG has constructed a stable and growing public chain assets.
overview.zh: ARG是一款基于区块链技术和人工智能的資產保存系统，通过實體黃金的託抵及開採和智能合约技术相结合，构建出了一款穩定且成長的公有链資產。
